original_text: Cows and bears will feed together. Even their children will lie down side by side. Lions will eat grass, as cows do.
korean_text: 암소와 곰이 함께 먹으며 그것들의 새끼가 함께 엎드리며 사자가 소처럼 풀을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Cows and bears will feed together.
Even their children will lie down side by side.
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 그들의 새끼들도 나란히 누울 것이다.
